snippet: Fiat Chrysler said that it would recall about 322,000 Dodge Charger sedans because their side airbags could deploy when car doors are slammed.
abstract: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles announces it will recall about 322,000 Dodge Charger sedans because their side airbags could deploy when car doors are slammed.
lead_paragraph: Fiat Chrysler said that it would recall about 322,000 Dodge Charger sedans because their side airbags could deploy when car doors are slammed.

headline.main: Fiat Chrysler Issues Recall of 2011-2014 Dodge Chargers
headline.print_headline: Fiat Chrysler Issues Recall of 2011-2014 Dodge Chargers
